revised_title: Roman Inscriptions and Antiquities in Netherby, Cumberland
tldr: The author examines two ancient Roman inscriptions discovered at Netherby in Cumberland, providing detailed descriptions and interpretations of their content and historical context. The inscriptions reveal information about the Roman presence in Britain during the reign of Emperor Alexander Severus and provide insights into the architectural and cultural aspects of the time.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
